live ticker : portugal 0:1 france -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 06.07.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 live ticker : portugal 0:1 france review all the action as it happened on dw-world.de 's live ticker . clash of the titans soccer legends luis figo and zinedine zidane both want the chance for one more game - and win - after tonight 's match against each other to end their careers on a high note .
the two men , both of whom had actually retired from international soccer once already , have said this world cup will be their final major tournament .
whoever wins in munich will play italy in berlin for soccer 's greatest prize .
tonight 's teams .
portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nuno valente ; 6-costinha , 18-maniche , 20-deco , 7-luis figo , 17-cristiano ronaldo ; 9-pauleta coach : luiz felipe scolari france -lrb- 4-2-3-1 -rrb- : 16-fabien barthez ; 19-willy sagnol , 15-lilian thuram , 5-william gallas , 3-eric abidal ; 4-patrick vieira , 6-claude makelele ; 22-franck ribery , 10-zinedine zidane , 7-florent malouda ; 12-thierry henry coach : raymond domenech referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- ten minutes to kick-off in munich .
the stadium is almost full .
lots of portugese blood red and french blue in the stands .
the teams are waiting in the tunnel .
the teams are walking in .
the two captains and real team mates - zidane and figo - look focused and have no time for friendly conversation .
cristiano ronaldo smiles as the portugese anthem begins .
does he know something we do n't ?
the camera sets on zidane for the french anthem .
will it be his last game today , or will he play a second world cup final ?
portugal win the toss .
1. min .
the game is on .
france kick off .
1. min .
malouda gets the first chance as he gets the ball from henry .
his shot is not clean and goes wide .
2. min .
ronaldo comes with good pace along the left wing but is stopped ten meters before the box .
4. min .
good chance for portugal .
ronaldo flies down the wing again and passes into deco outside the box who shoots .
barthez deflects with one hand and pauleta is blocked from hitting the ball into the french goal .
6. min .
the teams are taking turns playing their way to the box .
portugal are a bit faster but the french also combine well .
8. min .
ronaldo has started the game at top speed .
again he approaches the box bit this time flicks the ball backwards to maniche whose shot is only a foot over the bar .
9. min .
in the next attack , figo gets a low cross in that gallas manages to get a foot on .
11. min .
the portugese have had the better chances so far and the french have made unusually many mistakes in the first ten minutes .
13. min .
good combination by the french ends up dangerously close to henry 's foot .
ribery , zidane and abidal play the ball around and the latter gets the cross in that is not more than half a meter away from henry 's foot as he storms towards the far post .
15. min .
figo goes towards the box and is forced to shoot as pauleta is in an off-side position .
the shot is too weak and no problem for barthez .
18. min .
portugal have lost the pressure they had although the french are quite passive at the moment .
20. min .
makelele finds ribery with a lovely pass .
ribery passes to henry at the box line who tries a shot but hits a portugese defender .
23. min .
portugal bite themselves into the french half and ronaldo is the key as they combine but to little result .
25. min .
both teams are all but effective when they reach the box .
most of the time is spent passing within the team at midfield as if they need to build up confidence .
28. min .
henry gets the ball deep in the box to the left and dribbles past his defender to move in .
he flicks the ball towards the center but ricardo is first on the ball .
30. min .
the french defense seem to be warm and it 's getting increasingly more difficult for the portugese to come to any attempts at goal .
31. min .
penalty for france 33. min .
goal france and zidane ! ! 33. min .
henry is the one who wins the penalty as he gets brought down just inside the box but with free range to the goal .
zidane takes two steps back and shows all english players how to beat ricardo .
36. min .
maniche tries a long shot from twenty five meters and barthez does not look the most convincing as he struggles to hold on to the ball .
38. min .
ronaldo moves in from the right and shoots just inside the box .
a good shot that is deflected to a corner .
the young portugese has been the most prolific player on the pitch so far .
41. min .
the french are very disciplined and now control the pace of the game .
43. min .
ronaldo again .
this time he comes down the right and shoots outside the box .
the shot is wide though .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the portugese are pushing on hoping for the equalizer but with no luck .
a quite good first half where the portugese started off at high pace but the french defense soon found their rhythm .
after the french goal the tempo slowed down a bit as les blues took control of the game .
figo is looking a tad concerned as he waits for second half to begin .
45. min .
second half has started .
47. min .
henry gets a great chance !
the french striker gets a ball and starts a solo counter .
he goes past his defender and shoots outside the five meter line .
the ball is deflected to a corner by ricardo .
49. min .
france again !
zidane is having a good time making half the portugese team look like beginners and then passes the ball to ribery whose shot is saved by ricardo .
52. min .
ronaldo runs around with the ball but unlike first half his moves are inefficient .
53. min .
pauleta gets the ball inside the box for the first time .
the portugese striker turns and shoots into the left side of the net .
55. min .
a french counter started by henry sees ribery pass zidane outside the box where the french captain tries to direct the ball on to henry but it 's too hard .
57. min .
miguel is down but the cameras show he stumbles to the ground where he hangs out for a minute or two beefore being brought off the pitch .
he will probably be back soon .
60. min .
miguel is back but it does not look good .
61. min .
abidal gets a hard hit cross straight in the face outside the box .
the french defender is groggy and is helped off .
63. min .
miguel goes off for ferreira .
65. min .
the french are slowly backing home waiting for the counter and focusing on defending their lead .
68. min .
pauleta leaves for simao .
69. min .
malouda goes for wiltord .
70. min .
the portugese have not managed to create a lot so far in second half .
but the french are now deep into their own half and will probably feel some heat before the 90 minutes are over .
72. min .
ribery leaves for govou .
73. min .
the french now have all but henry on their own half .
the striker is hanging out in the mid circle waiting for the long ball .
75. min .
postiga comes on for costinha .
77. min .
portugal 's best chance .
ronaldo hits a free-kick from twentyfive meters that barthez ca n't hold .
the ball goes out to figo who has the whole goal to head the ball into but he is a bit late in his jump and the ball goes over the bar and lands in the net .
79. min .
the french are playing an ever more dangerous game as they do nothing but defend with no intentions to score the winner .
82. min .
carvalho is booked after a bad tackle on wiltord .
83. min .
figo wins a corner for portrugal but it 's poorly taken .
85. min .
henry goes off for saha .
86. min .
saha is booked and will not play in a possible final .
87. min .
the french have been extremely passive the last thirty minutes but there 's no question their tactics are effective .
89. min .
it also seems as if the portugese have half given up .
ronaldo is a shadow of his first half performance and deco has been invisible most of the game .
90 + 2. min .
meira gets the chance to shoot just outside the box but his half volley flies way high .
90 + 3. min .
a corner kick for portugal sees their goalie ricardo in the french box .
the portugese keeper manages a back kick that wins his team another corner .
90 + 4. min .
france are through and will play italy in the 2006 world cup final .
france 's tactics passed the test .
they stood firm at the back and gave the portugese few possibilities to come to a finish .
zidane gets his second final . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic 9798 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 magical zizou ready to cast spell over portuguese men of war großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : zinedine zidane has inspired france to new heights after a shaky start the masterful zinedine zidane and a resurgent france aim to make it unlucky number 13 for portugal coach luiz felipe scolari in the world cup semi-final in munich on wednesday . zidane , the 34-year-old sorcerer supreme , has rediscovered his best , imperious form to help steer france into the last four with victories over brazil and spain in the knockout rounds . now the real madrid maestro aims to account for portugal just as he did in the semi-final of euro 2000 , when zidane 's dramatic extra-time golden goal penalty took the french through to a final they eventually won . another french victory at the allianz arena on wednesday will end scolari 's record run of consecutive world cup victories , which moved to 12 after saturday 's pulsating quarter-final win over england . but while france have an impressive record over portugal , who they also beat in the 1984 european championship semi-final , coach raymond domenech has urged his team to forget the past . " we 've already beaten portugal but i 'm not into statistics , that 's history , this is 2006 , the reality is on wednesday night , " domenech said . france 's magical quarter-final win over brazil has sent belief that a second world cup crown in eight years is suddenly within touching distance after looking a distant dream during a shaky first round . domenech 's priority before wednesday is to get his side off of cloud nine and focused on the job of beating portugal .
" the danger for us now is to think we 've done it by beating brazil , we 've got to get the players back to where they were before that win , " domenech said . " we 've achieved something super ... but our work is not finished , we ca n't let up .
for me success at this world cup only comes if we win . " impe n di n g retireme n t drives zida n e to eve n greater heights bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the curtain wo n't come down on the zizou show just yet if zidane 's demeanor after saturday 's victory over the brazilians is anything to go by , domenech can rely on his captain to reinforce the message . while many of his team-mates celebrated , zidane permitted himself a smile of satisfaction and handshakes all round before leaving the pitch swiftly , as if already preparing himself mentally for the tasks ahead . with his retirement looming after the finals , zidane is determined to scale the peak that he achieved in 1998 , when he scored twice as brazil were beaten 3-0 in a memorable final in paris . according to domenech , it is his captain 's pending departure from the game that is behind his renaissance .
" i think it 's precisely because he is retiring , because he is ending his career , that he 's fully focused on the game , " domenech said . " now he does n't have to calculate anything .
he can play with freedom and expression , because he knows every game could be his last .
that is the reason why he 's able to play so well . " physical portugal a risk for carded fre n ch domenech 's biggest worry is the fact that no fewer than six of his expected starting line-up - zidane , willy sagnol , louis saha , lilian thuram , patrick vieira and franck ribery - go into the match on a yellow card . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's players have given no quarter with portugal having shown themselves to be adept at bringing the worst out of their opponents over the last two rounds , where both england and holland had players sent off against them , that will be a concern for domenech . " they are a quality side who have proved capable of imposing their style of play on their rivals , " said domenech .
" i do n't know scolari but i think he 's world champion is n't he ? " scolari , who coached brazil to the 2002 world cup , will be buoyed by the return from suspension of midfield playmaker deco and his minder costinha . the master motivator , scolari has urged his team to create history by becoming the first portuguese side to reach the world cup final in only their fourth tournament . history becko n s for scolari 's " warrior " team bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal coach scolari has instilled a warrior spirit " we had the chance to create a piece of history at the 2004 european championship and we did n't take it , " said scolari , referring to portugal 's failure to win their first major tournament on home soil two years ago .
" now we have got another chance to make history at the world cup . " scolari has put his team 's progression through the tournament down to a new-found ' warrior spirit ' that has been grafted on to portugal 's long tradition of technical excellence . " the spirit of this team is remarkable , " scolari said .
" this is a new portugal team and it 's a new spirit .
it 's a warrior spirit .
this is what we were missing in the past .
we had great technical players but now we have added a warrior spirit . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de henry 's strike enough to dump champions brazil out of cup france progressed to the world cup semi-finals after a pulsating but mostly cagey match in frankfurt in which they beat brazil 1-0 .
thierry henry 's goal means that les bleus will play portugal in munich on wednesday .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- england 's shoot-out suffering continues portugal booked a spot in the semi-finals after a penalty shoot-out that saw ricardo block three english shots .
england played the last hour of the game with 10 men in a controversy-packed quarter-final .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- world cup semi-finalists prepare for final push the world cup semi-finalists - germany , italy , france and portugal - were gathering their forces on monday and plotting their tactics for tuesday and wednesday 's games in dortmund and munich .
-lrb- july 3 , 2006 -rrb- www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and faetures from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback where would you rate zinedine zidane in the pantheon of soccer legends ?
please include your full name and country with any reply .

live ticker : portugal 0:1 france -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 09.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 live ticker : portugal 0:1 france review all the action as it happened on dw-world.de 's live ticker . clash of the titans soccer legends luis figo and zinedine zidane both want the chance for one more game - and win - after tonight 's match against each other to end their careers on a high note .
the two men , both of whom had actually retired from international soccer once already , have said this world cup will be their final major tournament .
whoever wins in munich will play italy in berlin for soccer 's greatest prize .
tonight 's teams .
portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nuno valente ; 6-costinha , 18-maniche , 20-deco , 7-luis figo , 17-cristiano ronaldo ; 9-pauleta coach : luiz felipe scolari france -lrb- 4-2-3-1 -rrb- : 16-fabien barthez ; 19-willy sagnol , 15-lilian thuram , 5-william gallas , 3-eric abidal ; 4-patrick vieira , 6-claude makelele ; 22-franck ribery , 10-zinedine zidane , 7-florent malouda ; 12-thierry henry coach : raymond domenech referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- ten minutes to kick-off in munich .
the stadium is almost full .
lots of portugese blood red and french blue in the stands .
the teams are waiting in the tunnel .
the teams are walking in .
the two captains and real team mates - zidane and figo - look focused and have no time for friendly conversation .
cristiano ronaldo smiles as the portugese anthem begins .
does he know something we do n't ?
the camera sets on zidane for the french anthem .
will it be his last game today , or will he play a second world cup final ?
portugal win the toss .
1. min .
the game is on .
france kick off .
1. min .
malouda gets the first chance as he gets the ball from henry .
his shot is not clean and goes wide .
2. min .
ronaldo comes with good pace along the left wing but is stopped ten meters before the box .
4. min .
good chance for portugal .
ronaldo flies down the wing again and passes into deco outside the box who shoots .
barthez deflects with one hand and pauleta is blocked from hitting the ball into the french goal .
6. min .
the teams are taking turns playing their way to the box .
portugal are a bit faster but the french also combine well .
8. min .
ronaldo has started the game at top speed .
again he approaches the box bit this time flicks the ball backwards to maniche whose shot is only a foot over the bar .
9. min .
in the next attack , figo gets a low cross in that gallas manages to get a foot on .
11. min .
the portugese have had the better chances so far and the french have made unusually many mistakes in the first ten minutes .
13. min .
good combination by the french ends up dangerously close to henry 's foot .
ribery , zidane and abidal play the ball around and the latter gets the cross in that is not more than half a meter away from henry 's foot as he storms towards the far post .
15. min .
figo goes towards the box and is forced to shoot as pauleta is in an off-side position .
the shot is too weak and no problem for barthez .
18. min .
portugal have lost the pressure they had although the french are quite passive at the moment .
20. min .
makelele finds ribery with a lovely pass .
ribery passes to henry at the box line who tries a shot but hits a portugese defender .
23. min .
portugal bite themselves into the french half and ronaldo is the key as they combine but to little result .
25. min .
both teams are all but effective when they reach the box .
most of the time is spent passing within the team at midfield as if they need to build up confidence .
28. min .
henry gets the ball deep in the box to the left and dribbles past his defender to move in .
he flicks the ball towards the center but ricardo is first on the ball .
30. min .
the french defense seem to be warm and it 's getting increasingly more difficult for the portugese to come to any attempts at goal .
31. min .
penalty for france 33. min .
goal france and zidane ! ! 33. min .
henry is the one who wins the penalty as he gets brought down just inside the box but with free range to the goal .
zidane takes two steps back and shows all english players how to beat ricardo .
36. min .
maniche tries a long shot from twenty five meters and barthez does not look the most convincing as he struggles to hold on to the ball .
38. min .
ronaldo moves in from the right and shoots just inside the box .
a good shot that is deflected to a corner .
the young portugese has been the most prolific player on the pitch so far .
41. min .
the french are very disciplined and now control the pace of the game .
43. min .
ronaldo again .
this time he comes down the right and shoots outside the box .
the shot is wide though .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the portugese are pushing on hoping for the equalizer but with no luck .
a quite good first half where the portugese started off at high pace but the french defense soon found their rhythm .
after the french goal the tempo slowed down a bit as les blues took control of the game .
figo is looking a tad concerned as he waits for second half to begin .
45. min .
second half has started .
47. min .
henry gets a great chance !
the french striker gets a ball and starts a solo counter .
he goes past his defender and shoots outside the five meter line .
the ball is deflected to a corner by ricardo .
49. min .
france again !
zidane is having a good time making half the portugese team look like beginners and then passes the ball to ribery whose shot is saved by ricardo .
52. min .
ronaldo runs around with the ball but unlike first half his moves are inefficient .
53. min .
pauleta gets the ball inside the box for the first time .
the portugese striker turns and shoots into the left side of the net .
55. min .
a french counter started by henry sees ribery pass zidane outside the box where the french captain tries to direct the ball on to henry but it 's too hard .
57. min .
miguel is down but the cameras show he stumbles to the ground where he hangs out for a minute or two beefore being brought off the pitch .
he will probably be back soon .
60. min .
miguel is back but it does not look good .
61. min .
abidal gets a hard hit cross straight in the face outside the box .
the french defender is groggy and is helped off .
63. min .
miguel goes off for ferreira .
65. min .
the french are slowly backing home waiting for the counter and focusing on defending their lead .
68. min .
pauleta leaves for simao .
69. min .
malouda goes for wiltord .
70. min .
the portugese have not managed to create a lot so far in second half .
but the french are now deep into their own half and will probably feel some heat before the 90 minutes are over .
72. min .
ribery leaves for govou .
73. min .
the french now have all but henry on their own half .
the striker is hanging out in the mid circle waiting for the long ball .
75. min .
postiga comes on for costinha .
77. min .
portugal 's best chance .
ronaldo hits a free-kick from twentyfive meters that barthez ca n't hold .
the ball goes out to figo who has the whole goal to head the ball into but he is a bit late in his jump and the ball goes over the bar and lands in the net .
79. min .
the french are playing an ever more dangerous game as they do nothing but defend with no intentions to score the winner .
82. min .
carvalho is booked after a bad tackle on wiltord .
83. min .
figo wins a corner for portrugal but it 's poorly taken .
85. min .
henry goes off for saha .
86. min .
saha is booked and will not play in a possible final .
87. min .
the french have been extremely passive the last thirty minutes but there 's no question their tactics are effective .
89. min .
it also seems as if the portugese have half given up .
ronaldo is a shadow of his first half performance and deco has been invisible most of the game .
90 + 2. min .
meira gets the chance to shoot just outside the box but his half volley flies way high .
90 + 3. min .
a corner kick for portugal sees their goalie ricardo in the french box .
the portugese keeper manages a back kick that wins his team another corner .
90 + 4. min .
france are through and will play italy in the 2006 world cup final .
france 's tactics passed the test .
they stood firm at the back and gave the portugese few possibilities to come to a finish .
zidane gets his second final . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 magical zizou ready to cast spell over portuguese men of war großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : zinedine zidane has inspired france to new heights after a shaky start the masterful zinedine zidane and a resurgent france aim to make it unlucky number 13 for portugal coach luiz felipe scolari in the world cup semi-final in munich on wednesday . zidane , the 34-year-old sorcerer supreme , has rediscovered his best , imperious form to help steer france into the last four with victories over brazil and spain in the knockout rounds . now the real madrid maestro aims to account for portugal just as he did in the semi-final of euro 2000 , when zidane 's dramatic extra-time golden goal penalty took the french through to a final they eventually won . another french victory at the allianz arena on wednesday will end scolari 's record run of consecutive world cup victories , which moved to 12 after saturday 's pulsating quarter-final win over england . but while france have an impressive record over portugal , who they also beat in the 1984 european championship semi-final , coach raymond domenech has urged his team to forget the past . " we 've already beaten portugal but i 'm not into statistics , that 's history , this is 2006 , the reality is on wednesday night , " domenech said . france 's magical quarter-final win over brazil has sent belief that a second world cup crown in eight years is suddenly within touching distance after looking a distant dream during a shaky first round . domenech 's priority before wednesday is to get his side off of cloud nine and focused on the job of beating portugal .
" the danger for us now is to think we 've done it by beating brazil , we 've got to get the players back to where they were before that win , " domenech said . " we 've achieved something super ... but our work is not finished , we ca n't let up .
for me success at this world cup only comes if we win . " impe n di n g retireme n t drives zida n e to eve n greater heights bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the curtain wo n't come down on the zizou show just yet if zidane 's demeanor after saturday 's victory over the brazilians is anything to go by , domenech can rely on his captain to reinforce the message . while many of his team-mates celebrated , zidane permitted himself a smile of satisfaction and handshakes all round before leaving the pitch swiftly , as if already preparing himself mentally for the tasks ahead . with his retirement looming after the finals , zidane is determined to scale the peak that he achieved in 1998 , when he scored twice as brazil were beaten 3-0 in a memorable final in paris . according to domenech , it is his captain 's pending departure from the game that is behind his renaissance .
" i think it 's precisely because he is retiring , because he is ending his career , that he 's fully focused on the game , " domenech said . " now he does n't have to calculate anything .
he can play with freedom and expression , because he knows every game could be his last .
that is the reason why he 's able to play so well . " physical portugal a risk for carded fre n ch domenech 's biggest worry is the fact that no fewer than six of his expected starting line-up - zidane , willy sagnol , louis saha , lilian thuram , patrick vieira and franck ribery - go into the match on a yellow card . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's players have given no quarter with portugal having shown themselves to be adept at bringing the worst out of their opponents over the last two rounds , where both england and holland had players sent off against them , that will be a concern for domenech . " they are a quality side who have proved capable of imposing their style of play on their rivals , " said domenech .
" i do n't know scolari but i think he 's world champion is n't he ? " scolari , who coached brazil to the 2002 world cup , will be buoyed by the return from suspension of midfield playmaker deco and his minder costinha . the master motivator , scolari has urged his team to create history by becoming the first portuguese side to reach the world cup final in only their fourth tournament . history becko n s for scolari 's " warrior " team bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal coach scolari has instilled a warrior spirit " we had the chance to create a piece of history at the 2004 european championship and we did n't take it , " said scolari , referring to portugal 's failure to win their first major tournament on home soil two years ago .
" now we have got another chance to make history at the world cup . " scolari has put his team 's progression through the tournament down to a new-found ' warrior spirit ' that has been grafted on to portugal 's long tradition of technical excellence . " the spirit of this team is remarkable , " scolari said .
" this is a new portugal team and it 's a new spirit .
it 's a warrior spirit .
this is what we were missing in the past .
we had great technical players but now we have added a warrior spirit . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de henry 's strike enough to dump champions brazil out of cup france progressed to the world cup semi-finals after a pulsating but mostly cagey match in frankfurt in which they beat brazil 1-0 .
thierry henry 's goal means that les bleus will play portugal in munich on wednesday .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- england 's shoot-out suffering continues portugal booked a spot in the semi-finals after a penalty shoot-out that saw ricardo block three english shots .
england played the last hour of the game with 10 men in a controversy-packed quarter-final .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- world cup semi-finalists prepare for final push the world cup semi-finalists - germany , italy , france and portugal - were gathering their forces on monday and plotting their tactics for tuesday and wednesday 's games in dortmund and munich .

magical zizou ready to cast spell over portuguese men of war -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 14.01.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 magical zizou ready to cast spell over portuguese men of war großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : zinedine zidane has inspired france to new heights after a shaky start the masterful zinedine zidane and a resurgent france aim to make it unlucky number 13 for portugal coach luiz felipe scolari in the world cup semi-final in munich on wednesday . zidane , the 34-year-old sorcerer supreme , has rediscovered his best , imperious form to help steer france into the last four with victories over brazil and spain in the knockout rounds . now the real madrid maestro aims to account for portugal just as he did in the semi-final of euro 2000 , when zidane 's dramatic extra-time golden goal penalty took the french through to a final they eventually won . another french victory at the allianz arena on wednesday will end scolari 's record run of consecutive world cup victories , which moved to 12 after saturday 's pulsating quarter-final win over england . but while france have an impressive record over portugal , who they also beat in the 1984 european championship semi-final , coach raymond domenech has urged his team to forget the past . " we 've already beaten portugal but i 'm not into statistics , that 's history , this is 2006 , the reality is on wednesday night , " domenech said . france 's magical quarter-final win over brazil has sent belief that a second world cup crown in eight years is suddenly within touching distance after looking a distant dream during a shaky first round . domenech 's priority before wednesday is to get his side off of cloud nine and focused on the job of beating portugal .
" the danger for us now is to think we 've done it by beating brazil , we 've got to get the players back to where they were before that win , " domenech said . " we 've achieved something super ... but our work is not finished , we ca n't let up .
for me success at this world cup only comes if we win . " impe n di n g retireme n t drives zida n e to eve n greater heights bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the curtain wo n't come down on the zizou show just yet if zidane 's demeanor after saturday 's victory over the brazilians is anything to go by , domenech can rely on his captain to reinforce the message . while many of his team-mates celebrated , zidane permitted himself a smile of satisfaction and handshakes all round before leaving the pitch swiftly , as if already preparing himself mentally for the tasks ahead . with his retirement looming after the finals , zidane is determined to scale the peak that he achieved in 1998 , when he scored twice as brazil were beaten 3-0 in a memorable final in paris . according to domenech , it is his captain 's pending departure from the game that is behind his renaissance .
" i think it 's precisely because he is retiring , because he is ending his career , that he 's fully focused on the game , " domenech said . " now he does n't have to calculate anything .
he can play with freedom and expression , because he knows every game could be his last .
that is the reason why he 's able to play so well . " physical portugal a risk for carded fre n ch domenech 's biggest worry is the fact that no fewer than six of his expected starting line-up - zidane , willy sagnol , louis saha , lilian thuram , patrick vieira and franck ribery - go into the match on a yellow card . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's players have given no quarter with portugal having shown themselves to be adept at bringing the worst out of their opponents over the last two rounds , where both england and holland had players sent off against them , that will be a concern for domenech . " they are a quality side who have proved capable of imposing their style of play on their rivals , " said domenech .
" i do n't know scolari but i think he 's world champion is n't he ? " scolari , who coached brazil to the 2002 world cup , will be buoyed by the return from suspension of midfield playmaker deco and his minder costinha . the master motivator , scolari has urged his team to create history by becoming the first portuguese side to reach the world cup final in only their fourth tournament . history becko n s for scolari 's " warrior " team bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal coach scolari has instilled a warrior spirit " we had the chance to create a piece of history at the 2004 european championship and we did n't take it , " said scolari , referring to portugal 's failure to win their first major tournament on home soil two years ago .
" now we have got another chance to make history at the world cup . " scolari has put his team 's progression through the tournament down to a new-found ' warrior spirit ' that has been grafted on to portugal 's long tradition of technical excellence . " the spirit of this team is remarkable , " scolari said .
" this is a new portugal team and it 's a new spirit .
it 's a warrior spirit .
this is what we were missing in the past .
we had great technical players but now we have added a warrior spirit . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de henry 's strike enough to dump champions brazil out of cup france progressed to the world cup semi-finals after a pulsating but mostly cagey match in frankfurt in which they beat brazil 1-0 .
thierry henry 's goal means that les bleus will play portugal in munich on wednesday .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- england 's shoot-out suffering continues portugal booked a spot in the semi-finals after a penalty shoot-out that saw ricardo block three english shots .
england played the last hour of the game with 10 men in a controversy-packed quarter-final .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- world cup semi-finalists prepare for final push the world cup semi-finalists - germany , italy , france and portugal - were gathering their forces on monday and plotting their tactics for tuesday and wednesday 's games in dortmund and munich .
-lrb- july 3 , 2006 -rrb- www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and faetures from the 2006 world cup in germany .
feedback where would you rate zinedine zidane in the pantheon of soccer legends ?
please include your full name and country with any reply .

magical zizou ready to cast spell over portuguese men of war -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 09.11.2010 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 magical zizou ready to cast spell over portuguese men of war großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : zinedine zidane has inspired france to new heights after a shaky start the masterful zinedine zidane and a resurgent france aim to make it unlucky number 13 for portugal coach luiz felipe scolari in the world cup semi-final in munich on wednesday . zidane , the 34-year-old sorcerer supreme , has rediscovered his best , imperious form to help steer france into the last four with victories over brazil and spain in the knockout rounds . now the real madrid maestro aims to account for portugal just as he did in the semi-final of euro 2000 , when zidane 's dramatic extra-time golden goal penalty took the french through to a final they eventually won . another french victory at the allianz arena on wednesday will end scolari 's record run of consecutive world cup victories , which moved to 12 after saturday 's pulsating quarter-final win over england . but while france have an impressive record over portugal , who they also beat in the 1984 european championship semi-final , coach raymond domenech has urged his team to forget the past . " we 've already beaten portugal but i 'm not into statistics , that 's history , this is 2006 , the reality is on wednesday night , " domenech said . france 's magical quarter-final win over brazil has sent belief that a second world cup crown in eight years is suddenly within touching distance after looking a distant dream during a shaky first round . domenech 's priority before wednesday is to get his side off of cloud nine and focused on the job of beating portugal .
" the danger for us now is to think we 've done it by beating brazil , we 've got to get the players back to where they were before that win , " domenech said . " we 've achieved something super ... but our work is not finished , we ca n't let up .
for me success at this world cup only comes if we win . " impe n di n g retireme n t drives zida n e to eve n greater heights bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the curtain wo n't come down on the zizou show just yet if zidane 's demeanor after saturday 's victory over the brazilians is anything to go by , domenech can rely on his captain to reinforce the message . while many of his team-mates celebrated , zidane permitted himself a smile of satisfaction and handshakes all round before leaving the pitch swiftly , as if already preparing himself mentally for the tasks ahead . with his retirement looming after the finals , zidane is determined to scale the peak that he achieved in 1998 , when he scored twice as brazil were beaten 3-0 in a memorable final in paris . according to domenech , it is his captain 's pending departure from the game that is behind his renaissance .
" i think it 's precisely because he is retiring , because he is ending his career , that he 's fully focused on the game , " domenech said . " now he does n't have to calculate anything .
he can play with freedom and expression , because he knows every game could be his last .
that is the reason why he 's able to play so well . " physical portugal a risk for carded fre n ch domenech 's biggest worry is the fact that no fewer than six of his expected starting line-up - zidane , willy sagnol , louis saha , lilian thuram , patrick vieira and franck ribery - go into the match on a yellow card . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's players have given no quarter with portugal having shown themselves to be adept at bringing the worst out of their opponents over the last two rounds , where both england and holland had players sent off against them , that will be a concern for domenech . " they are a quality side who have proved capable of imposing their style of play on their rivals , " said domenech .
" i do n't know scolari but i think he 's world champion is n't he ? " scolari , who coached brazil to the 2002 world cup , will be buoyed by the return from suspension of midfield playmaker deco and his minder costinha . the master motivator , scolari has urged his team to create history by becoming the first portuguese side to reach the world cup final in only their fourth tournament . history becko n s for scolari 's " warrior " team bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal coach scolari has instilled a warrior spirit " we had the chance to create a piece of history at the 2004 european championship and we did n't take it , " said scolari , referring to portugal 's failure to win their first major tournament on home soil two years ago .
" now we have got another chance to make history at the world cup . " scolari has put his team 's progression through the tournament down to a new-found ' warrior spirit ' that has been grafted on to portugal 's long tradition of technical excellence . " the spirit of this team is remarkable , " scolari said .
" this is a new portugal team and it 's a new spirit .
it 's a warrior spirit .
this is what we were missing in the past .
we had great technical players but now we have added a warrior spirit . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de henry 's strike enough to dump champions brazil out of cup france progressed to the world cup semi-finals after a pulsating but mostly cagey match in frankfurt in which they beat brazil 1-0 .
thierry henry 's goal means that les bleus will play portugal in munich on wednesday .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- england 's shoot-out suffering continues portugal booked a spot in the semi-finals after a penalty shoot-out that saw ricardo block three english shots .
england played the last hour of the game with 10 men in a controversy-packed quarter-final .
-lrb- july 1 , 2006 -rrb- world cup semi-finalists prepare for final push the world cup semi-finalists - germany , italy , france and portugal - were gathering their forces on monday and plotting their tactics for tuesday and wednesday 's games in dortmund and munich .
-lrb- july 3 , 2006 -rrb- www-links dw-world.de : the 2006 world cup news , match reports , previews and faetures from the 2006 world cup in germany .

" we 've already beaten portugal but i 'm not into statistics , that 's history , this is 2006 , the reality is on wednesday night , " domenech said . france 's magical quarter-final win over brazil has sent belief that a second world cup crown in eight years is suddenly within touching distance after looking a distant dream during a shaky first round . domenech 's priority before wednesday is to get his side off of cloud nine and focused on the job of beating portugal .

for me success at this world cup only comes if we win . " impe n di n g retireme n t drives zida n e to eve n greater heights bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : the curtain wo n't come down on the zizou show just yet if zidane 's demeanor after saturday 's victory over the brazilians is anything to go by , domenech can rely on his captain to reinforce the message . while many of his team-mates celebrated , zidane permitted himself a smile of satisfaction and handshakes all round before leaving the pitch swiftly , as if already preparing himself mentally for the tasks ahead . with his retirement looming after the finals , zidane is determined to scale the peak that he achieved in 1998 , when he scored twice as brazil were beaten 3-0 in a memorable final in paris . according to domenech , it is his captain 's pending departure from the game that is behind his renaissance .
" i think it 's precisely because he is retiring , because he is ending his career , that he 's fully focused on the game , " domenech said . " now he does n't have to calculate anything .
he can play with freedom and expression , because he knows every game could be his last .
that is the reason why he 's able to play so well . " physical portugal a risk for carded fre n ch domenech 's biggest worry is the fact that no fewer than six of his expected starting line-up - zidane , willy sagnol , louis saha , lilian thuram , patrick vieira and franck ribery - go into the match on a yellow card . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's players have given no quarter with portugal having shown themselves to be adept at bringing the worst out of their opponents over the last two rounds , where both england and holland had players sent off against them , that will be a concern for domenech . " they are a quality side who have proved capable of imposing their style of play on their rivals , " said domenech .
" i do n't know scolari but i think he 's world champion is n't he ? " scolari , who coached brazil to the 2002 world cup , will be buoyed by the return from suspension of midfield playmaker deco and his minder costinha . the master motivator , scolari has urged his team to create history by becoming the first portuguese side to reach the world cup final in only their fourth tournament . history becko n s for scolari 's " warrior " team bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal coach scolari has instilled a warrior spirit " we had the chance to create a piece of history at the 2004 european championship and we did n't take it , " said scolari , referring to portugal 's failure to win their first major tournament on home soil two years ago .
" now we have got another chance to make history at the world cup . " scolari has put his team 's progression through the tournament down to a new-found ' warrior spirit ' that has been grafted on to portugal 's long tradition of technical excellence . " the spirit of this team is remarkable , " scolari said .
" this is a new portugal team and it 's a new spirit .
it 's a warrior spirit .
this is what we were missing in the past .
we had great technical players but now we have added a warrior spirit . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de henry 's strike enough to dump champions brazil out of cup france progressed to the world cup semi-finals after a pulsating but mostly cagey match in frankfurt in which they beat brazil 1-0 .

" i think it 's precisely because he is retiring , because he is ending his career , that he 's fully focused on the game , " domenech said . " now he does n't have to calculate anything .
he can play with freedom and expression , because he knows every game could be his last .
that is the reason why he 's able to play so well . " physical portugal a risk for carded fre n ch domenech 's biggest worry is the fact that no fewer than six of his expected starting line-up - zidane , willy sagnol , louis saha , lilian thuram , patrick vieira and franck ribery - go into the match on a yellow card . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal 's players have given no quarter with portugal having shown themselves to be adept at bringing the worst out of their opponents over the last two rounds , where both england and holland had players sent off against them , that will be a concern for domenech . " they are a quality side who have proved capable of imposing their style of play on their rivals , " said domenech .
" i do n't know scolari but i think he 's world champion is n't he ? " scolari , who coached brazil to the 2002 world cup , will be buoyed by the return from suspension of midfield playmaker deco and his minder costinha . the master motivator , scolari has urged his team to create history by becoming the first portuguese side to reach the world cup final in only their fourth tournament . history becko n s for scolari 's " warrior " team bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : portugal coach scolari has instilled a warrior spirit " we had the chance to create a piece of history at the 2004 european championship and we did n't take it , " said scolari , referring to portugal 's failure to win their first major tournament on home soil two years ago .
" now we have got another chance to make history at the world cup . " scolari has put his team 's progression through the tournament down to a new-found ' warrior spirit ' that has been grafted on to portugal 's long tradition of technical excellence . " the spirit of this team is remarkable , " scolari said .
" this is a new portugal team and it 's a new spirit .
it 's a warrior spirit .
this is what we were missing in the past .
we had great technical players but now we have added a warrior spirit . " dw staff -lrb- nda -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de henry 's strike enough to dump champions brazil out of cup france progressed to the world cup semi-finals after a pulsating but mostly cagey match in frankfurt in which they beat brazil 1-0 .

live ticker : portugal 0:1 france -pipe- match reports -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 13.01.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
programs reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de match reports -pipe- 05.07.2006 live ticker : portugal 0:1 france review all the action as it happened on dw-world.de 's live ticker . clash of the titans soccer legends luis figo and zinedine zidane both want the chance for one more game - and win - after tonight 's match against each other to end their careers on a high note .
the two men , both of whom had actually retired from international soccer once already , have said this world cup will be their final major tournament .
whoever wins in munich will play italy in berlin for soccer 's greatest prize .
tonight 's teams .
portugal -lrb- 4-5-1 -rrb- : 1-ricardo ; 13-miguel , 16-ricardo carvalho , 5-fernando meira , 14-nuno valente ; 6-costinha , 18-maniche , 20-deco , 7-luis figo , 17-cristiano ronaldo ; 9-pauleta coach : luiz felipe scolari france -lrb- 4-2-3-1 -rrb- : 16-fabien barthez ; 19-willy sagnol , 15-lilian thuram , 5-william gallas , 3-eric abidal ; 4-patrick vieira , 6-claude makelele ; 22-franck ribery , 10-zinedine zidane , 7-florent malouda ; 12-thierry henry coach : raymond domenech referee : jorge larrionda -lrb- uruguay -rrb- ten minutes to kick-off in munich .
the stadium is almost full .
lots of portugese blood red and french blue in the stands .
the teams are waiting in the tunnel .
the teams are walking in .
the two captains and real team mates - zidane and figo - look focused and have no time for friendly conversation .
cristiano ronaldo smiles as the portugese anthem begins .
does he know something we do n't ?
the camera sets on zidane for the french anthem .
will it be his last game today , or will he play a second world cup final ?
portugal win the toss .
1. min .
the game is on .
france kick off .
1. min .
malouda gets the first chance as he gets the ball from henry .
his shot is not clean and goes wide .
2. min .
ronaldo comes with good pace along the left wing but is stopped ten meters before the box .
4. min .
good chance for portugal .
ronaldo flies down the wing again and passes into deco outside the box who shoots .
barthez deflects with one hand and pauleta is blocked from hitting the ball into the french goal .
6. min .
the teams are taking turns playing their way to the box .
portugal are a bit faster but the french also combine well .
8. min .
ronaldo has started the game at top speed .
again he approaches the box bit this time flicks the ball backwards to maniche whose shot is only a foot over the bar .
9. min .
in the next attack , figo gets a low cross in that gallas manages to get a foot on .
11. min .
the portugese have had the better chances so far and the french have made unusually many mistakes in the first ten minutes .
13. min .
good combination by the french ends up dangerously close to henry 's foot .
ribery , zidane and abidal play the ball around and the latter gets the cross in that is not more than half a meter away from henry 's foot as he storms towards the far post .
15. min .
figo goes towards the box and is forced to shoot as pauleta is in an off-side position .
the shot is too weak and no problem for barthez .
18. min .
portugal have lost the pressure they had although the french are quite passive at the moment .
20. min .
makelele finds ribery with a lovely pass .
ribery passes to henry at the box line who tries a shot but hits a portugese defender .
23. min .
portugal bite themselves into the french half and ronaldo is the key as they combine but to little result .
25. min .
both teams are all but effective when they reach the box .
most of the time is spent passing within the team at midfield as if they need to build up confidence .
28. min .
henry gets the ball deep in the box to the left and dribbles past his defender to move in .
he flicks the ball towards the center but ricardo is first on the ball .
30. min .
the french defense seem to be warm and it 's getting increasingly more difficult for the portugese to come to any attempts at goal .
31. min .
penalty for france 33. min .
goal france and zidane ! ! 33. min .
henry is the one who wins the penalty as he gets brought down just inside the box but with free range to the goal .
zidane takes two steps back and shows all english players how to beat ricardo .
36. min .
maniche tries a long shot from twenty five meters and barthez does not look the most convincing as he struggles to hold on to the ball .
38. min .
ronaldo moves in from the right and shoots just inside the box .
a good shot that is deflected to a corner .
the young portugese has been the most prolific player on the pitch so far .
41. min .
the french are very disciplined and now control the pace of the game .
43. min .
ronaldo again .
this time he comes down the right and shoots outside the box .
the shot is wide though .
45 + 1. min .
first half is over .
the portugese are pushing on hoping for the equalizer but with no luck .
a quite good first half where the portugese started off at high pace but the french defense soon found their rhythm .
after the french goal the tempo slowed down a bit as les blues took control of the game .
figo is looking a tad concerned as he waits for second half to begin .
45. min .
second half has started .
47. min .
henry gets a great chance !
the french striker gets a ball and starts a solo counter .
he goes past his defender and shoots outside the five meter line .
the ball is deflected to a corner by ricardo .
49. min .
france again !
zidane is having a good time making half the portugese team look like beginners and then passes the ball to ribery whose shot is saved by ricardo .
52. min .
ronaldo runs around with the ball but unlike first half his moves are inefficient .
53. min .
pauleta gets the ball inside the box for the first time .
the portugese striker turns and shoots into the left side of the net .
55. min .
a french counter started by henry sees ribery pass zidane outside the box where the french captain tries to direct the ball on to henry but it 's too hard .
57. min .
miguel is down but the cameras show he stumbles to the ground where he hangs out for a minute or two beefore being brought off the pitch .
he will probably be back soon .
60. min .
miguel is back but it does not look good .
61. min .
abidal gets a hard hit cross straight in the face outside the box .
the french defender is groggy and is helped off .
63. min .
miguel goes off for ferreira .
65. min .
the french are slowly backing home waiting for the counter and focusing on defending their lead .
68. min .
pauleta leaves for simao .
69. min .
malouda goes for wiltord .
70. min .
the portugese have not managed to create a lot so far in second half .
but the french are now deep into their own half and will probably feel some heat before the 90 minutes are over .
72. min .
ribery leaves for govou .
73. min .
the french now have all but henry on their own half .
the striker is hanging out in the mid circle waiting for the long ball .
75. min .
postiga comes on for costinha .
77. min .
portugal 's best chance .
ronaldo hits a free-kick from twentyfive meters that barthez ca n't hold .
the ball goes out to figo who has the whole goal to head the ball into but he is a bit late in his jump and the ball goes over the bar and lands in the net .
79. min .
the french are playing an ever more dangerous game as they do nothing but defend with no intentions to score the winner .
82. min .
carvalho is booked after a bad tackle on wiltord .
83. min .
figo wins a corner for portrugal but it 's poorly taken .
85. min .
henry goes off for saha .
86. min .
saha is booked and will not play in a possible final .
87. min .
the french have been extremely passive the last thirty minutes but there 's no question their tactics are effective .
89. min .
it also seems as if the portugese have half given up .
ronaldo is a shadow of his first half performance and deco has been invisible most of the game .
90 + 2. min .
meira gets the chance to shoot just outside the box but his half volley flies way high .
90 + 3. min .
a corner kick for portugal sees their goalie ricardo in the french box .
the portugese keeper manages a back kick that wins his team another corner .
90 + 4. min .
france are through and will play italy in the 2006 world cup final .
france 's tactics passed the test .
they stood firm at the back and gave the portugese few possibilities to come to a finish .
zidane gets his second final . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .
9798 picture gallery daily highlights from the world cup the world cup in pictures a nation expects dw-world.de presents germany 's 2006 world cup squad .
klinsmann springs surprises in naming world cup squad germany world cup squad stadiums check out the 12 venues for the 2006 world cup .
world cup 2006 stadiums from the fringe have a laugh read about quirky happenings in thigh-slappin ' germany in this dw-world.de dossier .
visit germany exploring deutschland check out dw-world 's section with tips and reports from all parts of the country . © dw 2011 deutsche welle is not responsible for the content of external websites .

a french counter started by henry sees ribery pass zidane outside the box where the french captain tries to direct the ball on to henry but it 's too hard .
57. min .
miguel is down but the cameras show he stumbles to the ground where he hangs out for a minute or two beefore being brought off the pitch .
he will probably be back soon .
60. min .
miguel is back but it does not look good .
61. min .
abidal gets a hard hit cross straight in the face outside the box .
the french defender is groggy and is helped off .
63. min .
miguel goes off for ferreira .
65. min .
the french are slowly backing home waiting for the counter and focusing on defending their lead .
68. min .
pauleta leaves for simao .
69. min .
malouda goes for wiltord .
70. min .
the portugese have not managed to create a lot so far in second half .
but the french are now deep into their own half and will probably feel some heat before the 90 minutes are over .
72. min .
ribery leaves for govou .
73. min .
the french now have all but henry on their own half .
the striker is hanging out in the mid circle waiting for the long ball .
75. min .
postiga comes on for costinha .
77. min .
portugal 's best chance .
ronaldo hits a free-kick from twentyfive meters that barthez ca n't hold .
the ball goes out to figo who has the whole goal to head the ball into but he is a bit late in his jump and the ball goes over the bar and lands in the net .
79. min .
the french are playing an ever more dangerous game as they do nothing but defend with no intentions to score the winner .
82. min .
carvalho is booked after a bad tackle on wiltord .
83. min .
figo wins a corner for portrugal but it 's poorly taken .
85. min .
henry goes off for saha .
86. min .
saha is booked and will not play in a possible final .
87. min .
the french have been extremely passive the last thirty minutes but there 's no question their tactics are effective .
89. min .
it also seems as if the portugese have half given up .
ronaldo is a shadow of his first half performance and deco has been invisible most of the game .
90 + 2. min .
meira gets the chance to shoot just outside the box but his half volley flies way high .
90 + 3. min .
a corner kick for portugal sees their goalie ricardo in the french box .
the portugese keeper manages a back kick that wins his team another corner .
90 + 4. min .
france are through and will play italy in the 2006 world cup final .
france 's tactics passed the test .
they stood firm at the back and gave the portugese few possibilities to come to a finish .
zidane gets his second final . send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic feedback send us an e-mail .
please include your name and country in your reply .

press review : chin up , germany -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese for africa romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 14.06.2011 home news germany europe world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio about dw-radio what 's on ?
reception audio on demand learning by ear dw-tv what 's on ?
program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de europe -pipe- 05.07.2006 press review : chin up , germany großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a sad walk home for this germany fan european editorials on wednesday commented on germany 's dramatic loss to italy in tuesday 's world cup semi-final match , with most papers giving germany a sympathetic pat on the back for a job well done . in a display of good sportsmanship , berlin 's morge n post allowed readers a moment of sadness , but only a moment .
" the close defeat does n't hurt , " the paper said , " because the german team achieved so much . "
" these players did n't just come out ahead of strong nations such as brazil , argentina , and the netherlands - their appearances were also really enjoyable .
they also changed the people in this country , at least for three and a half weeks , leaving them happier , more relaxed and more confident . " " we 're crying with you , " read the headline in the popular tabloid bild zeitu n g , " but you 're still heroes ! "
the paper was full of encouragement after the bitter defeat , and full of confidence that germany " will take third place on saturday , and not complain ... to klinsi and all the boys , we say , thank you for this wonderful world cup .
what has grown in the last couple of weeks will remain .
the germans have re-discovered a love for their country and their team , " bild wrote . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : germany 's coach jürgen klinsmann : what does his future hold ?
the fra n kfurter allgemei n e zeitu n g commented on the achievements of german coach jürgen klinsmann , writing that the passionate soccer that brought germany so much joy is a victory that no one can take away .
the california-based national trainer must now decide whether he will continue in his role , the paper said .
" thanks to klinsmann , german soccer gained an unexpected easiness and a new perspective .
not to use this , to let the flame die , would be a much greater loss than the defeat in the semi-final match - with or without klinsmann . " outside germany , britain 's daily mirror commented on the italian team , saying that tuesday 's victory would go a long way in redeeming italy in the wake of the soccer corruption scandal that " infected the soul of the nation ... they came as the pariahs of the world , the men who represented everything that football wants to forget about the dark side of the beautiful game , " the paper wrote .
" but on sunday , it is italy who will march into berlin 's olympic stadium , their chests puffed out with pride , their honor restored , their courage rewarded . " the guardia n of london commented that germany has been " brusquely shaken awake from its world cup dream , " but said that the team can hold their heads high .
" throughout the world cup they played intelligent , aggressive football , " the paper said , adding that tuesday 's game could have gone either way .
" afterwards there were tears in the westfalenstadion and across the country , but better this death than meek surrender . " sweden 's afto n bladet was pleased with the match , praising both sides .
" italy came to the world cup as the object of hatred and has now achieved more than anyone could have dreamed , " the paper wrote .
" the italians played for their honor , the germans for a nation in ecstasy .
finally , a world cup match that met the greatest of expectations . " and as to be expected , italy 's press was full of praise for the men in blue .
" wonderful italy , " wrote rome 's la stampa .
" grosso and del piero have given us the finals , we 're going to berlin .
a party has exploded on our streets - we 're all united through the blue triumph . " dw staff -lrb- dc -rrb- send us an e-mail » -pipe- send » -pipe- print » more on the topic dw-world.de two late extra-time goals kill off germany 's world cup dream italy scored two sensational late goals in extra-time to book their place in the world cup final for the first time in 12 years with their 2-0 win crushing the dreams of host nation germany in dortmund on tuesday .
-lrb- july 4 , 2006 -rrb- the world cup is over for germany but the party must continue hosts germany are out of the world cup after losing to italy .
the whole country goes into mourning but dw-world.de believes germany still has plenty to celebrate even though the dream is now over . -lrb- july 4 , 2006 -rrb- " you are heroes , " shocked and disappointed germans say after losing the world cup semi-finals to italy tuesday , the host nation reflects on what might have been but say that they are proud of their team 's accomplishments .
-lrb- july 5 , 2006 -rrb- 9798 radio news listen to world headlines from the top of the hour .
dw-tv europe live journal - nachrichten mit tagesthema we 're sorry , due to legal issues this content can not be transmitted as live stream .
if you are inside the united states , it is still possible for you to enjoy dw-tv .
for more information , please click here .

health a london conference raises $ 4.3 billion to vaccinate millions of poor children .
listen to the audio drugs a french socialist candidate pushes to legalize cannabis ahead of the country 's elections .
listen to the audio russia hundreds attend the funeral of a controversial russian colonel convicted of strangling a girl .
listen to the audio europe 's borders african refugees flee unrest and arrive on island of malta with hopes for a better life .
watch the video art schools for the russian minority in latvia could soon be forced to scrap bilingual lessons .

program guide programs video on demand reception about dw-tv interactive reader response newsletters web tools and services podcasting mobile about dw-world.de europe -pipe- 05.07.2006 press review : chin up , germany großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : a sad walk home for this germany fan european editorials on wednesday commented on germany 's dramatic loss to italy in tuesday 's world cup semi-final match , with most papers giving germany a sympathetic pat on the back for a job well done . in a display of good sportsmanship , berlin 's morge n post allowed readers a moment of sadness , but only a moment .
" the close defeat does n't hurt , " the paper said , " because the german team achieved so much . "
" these players did n't just come out ahead of strong nations such as brazil , argentina , and the netherlands - their appearances were also really enjoyable .
they also changed the people in this country , at least for three and a half weeks , leaving them happier , more relaxed and more confident . " " we 're crying with you , " read the headline in the popular tabloid bild zeitu n g , " but you 're still heroes ! "
the paper was full of encouragement after the bitter defeat , and full of confidence that germany " will take third place on saturday , and not complain ... to klinsi and all the boys , we say , thank you for this wonderful world cup .
what has grown in the last couple of weeks will remain .
the germans have re-discovered a love for their country and their team , " bild wrote . bildunterschrift : großansicht des bildes mit der bildunterschrift : germany 's coach jürgen klinsmann : what does his future hold ?
the fra n kfurter allgemei n e zeitu n g commented on the achievements of german coach jürgen klinsmann , writing that the passionate soccer that brought germany so much joy is a victory that no one can take away .
the california-based national trainer must now decide whether he will continue in his role , the paper said .
" thanks to klinsmann , german soccer gained an unexpected easiness and a new perspective .
not to use this , to let the flame die , would be a much greater loss than the defeat in the semi-final match - with or without klinsmann . " outside germany , britain 's daily mirror commented on the italian team , saying that tuesday 's victory would go a long way in redeeming italy in the wake of the soccer corruption scandal that " infected the soul of the nation ... they came as the pariahs of the world , the men who represented everything that football wants to forget about the dark side of the beautiful game , " the paper wrote .
" but on sunday , it is italy who will march into berlin 's olympic stadium , their chests puffed out with pride , their honor restored , their courage rewarded . " the guardia n of london commented that germany has been " brusquely shaken awake from its world cup dream , " but said that the team can hold their heads high .
" throughout the world cup they played intelligent , aggressive football , " the paper said , adding that tuesday 's game could have gone either way .
" afterwards there were tears in the westfalenstadion and across the country , but better this death than meek surrender . " sweden 's afto n bladet was pleased with the match , praising both sides .
" italy came to the world cup as the object of hatred and has now achieved more than anyone could have dreamed , " the paper wrote .
" the italians played for their honor , the germans for a nation in ecstasy .
finally , a world cup match that met the greatest of expectations . " and as to be expected , italy 's press was full of praise for the men in blue .
" wonderful italy , " wrote rome 's la stampa .
" grosso and del piero have given us the finals , we 're going to berlin .
a party has exploded on our streets - we 're all united through the blue triumph . finally , a world cup match that met the greatest of expectations . " and as to be expected , italy 's press was full of praise for the men in blue .

a party has exploded on our streets - we 're all united through the blue triumph . press review : chin up , germany -pipe- europe -pipe- deutsche welle -pipe- 05.07.2006 main content main navigation extra content head navigation search choose form 30 languages about us press business & sales dw-akademie dw-store contact help partner site map archive search keywords search extended search your link to germany choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages choose from 30 languages english german chinese spanish portuguese for brazil arabic russian persian albanian amharic bengali bosnian b / h / s bulgarian croatian dari french greek hausa hindi indonesian kiswahili macedonian pashto polish portuguese romanian serbian turkish ukrainian urdu choose from 30 languages 19.12.2010 home news germany europe map world asia business science & technology environment & development culture & lifestyle sports germany info visit germany facts about germany study in germany german courses learning german deutsch unterrichten german xxl dw-radio what 's on ?
